summary: This mod add new standalone follower “Emma”.
descriptionHtml:
[img]https://staticdelivery.nexusmods.com/mods/110/images/86558-3-1504903659.jpg[/img]

This mod add new standalone follower “Emma”.
She is in Temple of Kynareth.



【About Her】
Name : Emma
Voice  : FemaleYoungEager
Body   : UNP(Weight:50)    
Place  : Temple of Kynareth in Whiterun
Combat style :Ice magic and Heal Shouts, Bow.


【Magic】
Frostbite
Ice Spike
Ice Storm
Frost Cloak
Heal Shouts


【Credits】
